title: Volodymyr Zelenskyy – 2022 Statement on the Situation in Ukraine (07/03/2022)
author: admin
summary: The statement made by Volodymyr Zelenskyy, the President of Ukraine, on 7 March 2022.
content:
Monday. Evening. You know, we used to say: Monday is a hard day. There is a war in the country. So every day is Monday.
